subject: Baseball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Florida International’s Garrett Wittels went 0 for 4 in a season-opening 10-2 loss to Southeastern Louisiana, leaving him two games shy of matching Robin Ventura’s 58-game hitting streak.
snippet: Florida International’s Garrett Wittels went 0 for 4 in a season-opening 10-2 loss to Southeastern Louisiana, leaving him two games shy of matching Robin Ventura’s 58-game hitting streak.
